resources.string: Which of the following is a primary component of a computer\'s Central Processing Unit (CPU)?

string-array.name: quiz_answers
string-array.item: Deriving a new class from an existing one
To manage hardware and software resources
Save changes to the local repository
A unique string identifier for a computer on a network

string-array.name: quiz_questions
string-array.item: Which of the following is a primary component of a computer\'s Central Processing Unit (CPU)?
What is the time complexity of a binary search algorithm?
In object-oriented programming, what does "inheritance" refer to?
Copying code from one class to another
Deriving a new class from an existing one
Which protocol is used to send emails?
What is the primary purpose of an operating system?
To manage hardware and software resources
Which data structure uses the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) method?
What is the function of the "git commit" command in Git?
Upload changes to the remote repository
Save changes to the local repository
Which of the following is NOT a programming paradigm?
A hardware address for a network card
A unique string identifier for a computer on a network
Which of the following sorting algorithms has the worst-case time complexity of O(n^2)?
What does the acronym HTTP stand for?
Which of the following is an example of a compiled programming language?
Which layer of the OSI model is responsible for routing packets across a network?
Which type of database stores data in tables with rows and columns?
What is the output of the boolean expression (true AND false) OR true?
Which sorting algorithm is considered the fastest on average for large datasets?
What is the purpose of the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)?
To compile Java code to machine code
Which data structure is most efficient for searching and insertion operations?
Which of the following is an example of a NoSQL database?
